title: Font problems with QuarkXPress
content:
Hi all,

I’m not very familiar with the latest Quark versions and I’m  
wondering if someone can report any similar problems - or even  
solutions:  
A customer uses one of our fonts (OpenType CFF) with QuarkXPress  
7.3.1 on Mac OS 10.4.6. If the “standard ligature” feature is turned  
on, sometimes (not always) any further editing of the text (like  
manual Kerning, Spacing, horizontal scaling etc.) will result in a  
crash of Quark (not the OS). If the ligatures are off everything  
works fine.

Is there a known problem of Quark with OT-features?  
Thanks for any ideas!  
Oliver

 [‹ Font conflict with Helvetica Neue in Leopard, FontExplorer X](http://web.archive.org/web/20080405115048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41591 "Go to previous forum topic") [renaming typefaces in fontbook ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080405115048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41518 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content: Try this: uncheck US-Extended (Open International -\> Input Menu)
